describe: Yemen is a country located on the southern tip of the Arabian Peninsula in Western Asia. It is known for its rich history, diverse culture, and unique architecture. Yemen has a complex political landscape and faces significant humanitarian challenges.

cities.name: 🏙 Sana'a
cities.geographical_location: Located in the Yemeni Highlands, Sana'a is the capital and largest city of Yemen.
cities.climate: Sana'a has a semi-arid climate with mild, dry winters and warm, dry summers.
cities.famous_cuisine: Saltah, a traditional Yemeni stew, and Bint Al-Sahn, a honey cake.

cities.name: 🏙 Aden
cities.geographical_location: A port city located by the Arabian Sea in southern Yemen.
cities.climate: Aden has a hot desert climate with very little rainfall and high temperatures year-round.
cities.famous_cuisine: Mandi, a fragrant rice and meat dish, and Fahsa, a spiced meat stew.

cities.name: 🏔 Taiz
cities.geographical_location: Situated in the Yemeni Highlands, Taiz is known for its mountainous terrain.
cities.climate: Taiz has a moderate climate with cooler temperatures compared to other parts of Yemen.
cities.famous_cuisine: Aseed, a dough-based dish, and Shafout, a yogurt-based bread dish.

cities.name: 🏝 Mukalla
cities.geographical_location: Located on the southeastern coast of Yemen along the Arabian Sea.
cities.climate: Mukalla has a hot desert climate with high humidity and warm temperatures year-round.
cities.famous_cuisine: Sayadiah, a fish and rice dish, and Maraq, a meat soup.
